オプション1:
"There's this incredibly fat ghost and this bony human guy.
The skinny one just kept laughing non-stop—he was creepy.
He said he’d kill me and my parents because we’re mentally ill, and then laughed about it."

"He laughed so hard he couldn’t even stand up,
and eventually collapsed on the ground."
"Haha, who *is* that guy? Sounds kinda funny."
"That was Nes. And the ghost was definitely Noble."
"VSCO hasn’t shown up again since then."
"Now that you mention it, we haven’t seen Vim either."
"They supposedly don’t need food to survive, right?"
(Maybe I’ll try going to See Poroporo moss garden...)
